home.hero_title: Market for wide range of coffee flavors
home.hero_description: A dedicated range of professional coffee machines designed to meet your needs
home.our_exclusive_partners: Our exclusive partners from around the world
home.new_coffee_machines_description: Wide range of brand new coffee brewer machines
home.unlimited_coffee_description: Yes, you heard it right, unlimited coffee, as straight as it gets
home.constant_sales_description: Sales, promotions and lots of stuff absolutely for free

plans.subscribe_description: Subscribe to one of our plans
plans.lite_plan_description: The Coffee Lite is an entry-level subscription plan for people who like to drink quality coffee occasionally, at an affordable price.
plans.standard_plan_description: The Coffee Standard is a subscription plan for people who like to drink quality coffee regularly and want to try new flavors.
plans.pro_plan_description: The Coffee Pro is a premium subscription plan for coffee enthusiasts who want to explore a wide variety of flavors and enjoy a consistent supply of high-quality coffee.

contract.title: Contract
contract.description: Great coffee makes work environment great. Join us in creating a revolutionary experience in coffee enjoyment.
contract.contact_info: If you are interested in our services, contact us with any questions and get comprehensive information:

services.title: What We Offer
services.intro_1: We provide automated coffee machines tailored to your office needs, ensuring you get the most out of every coffee bean with just a touch of a button.
services.intro_2: We cater to all your employees' tastes with a wide selection of high-quality coffee beans and flexible subscription packages.
services.intro_3: Our experienced team is ready to offer top-notch support service to ensure an uninterrupted coffee experience for your office.
services.reason_1: We work with the most recognized coffee producers to provide only the best quality coffee beans.
services.reason_2: Our unified digital platform makes coffee management easy, ensures cost efficiency and time savings.
services.reason_3: We value sustainable development goals and recommend coffee beans from farms that follow strict ecological and ethical standards.

about.title: Greetings from CoffeeSea.
about.paragraph_1: We believe that good coffee is not just a drink - it is a source of employee satisfaction, productivity and creativity, which are essential in any work environment.
about.paragraph_2: Our mission is to provide high-quality coffee in your workspace through automatic coffee machines rental and premium coffee beans supply services.
about.paragraph_3: Our goal is to improve your office environment by ensuring access to the highest quality coffee, with the ability to manage all services from a single digital platform to save your company time and resources.
about.cta: Learn more about our services and contact us.
